original_title: Confessions of a Black Con Man: The Road to Redemption
overview: A black con man who came from humble beginnings in the Jim Crow South. He tells the story of the the cons he would creatively execute  scamming over 3 million dollars in over 50 years while avoiding harsh prison time.
tagline: Don't get conned. It is easier than you think.
title: Confessions of a Black Con Man: The Road to Redemption
